item.title: My Minigame
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“TranScape, post:2, topic:285322”]if (pkrdy()) { if (server.GameTimer <= 1) { teleportToX = 2522 + misc.random(13); teleportToX = 3754 + misc.random(4); sendMessage("You have entered the Game Area"); } }

Try that.

Just Spitballing.[/quote]
hmm, acually i had it at == at one point, forgot about that = being a god idea to have there tho lol. Alright, ill add the = and see what it does, if not ill be back lol

Read full topic

item.title: My Minigame
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, i have developed a fun pk mini game. I had a lot of requests from people on my server for a new fun pk, so i thought this would be cool. Well everything works except 1 small part. When the timer hits 0, it doesn’t teleport u into the game. When i compiled it gave me no errors though. Here is the code for it. Is there something wrong with the code or no?

		if (pkrdy()) {
		 if (server.GameTimer < 1) {
			teleportToX = 2522 + misc.random(13);
			teleportToX = 3754 + misc.random(4);
			sendMessage("You have entered the Game Area");
		}
		}

Read full topic
